data.name: F1® 22: Champions Content Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Buy F1® 22: Champions Content Bundle and receive*:
  • New My Team Icons Pack
  • 2 Drivable Safety Cars, available only in Time Trial Mode: Mercedes-AMG GT Black Series Safety Car and Aston Martin Vantage Safety Car
  • 18,000 PitCoin
  • F1® 22 Life Starter Pack: Make your space your own with items such as furniture and a player T-shirt.
  • F1® 22 New Era Content: Car livery, Suit, Helmet, Cap, and T-shirt (for F1® Life), inspired by the stunning Official Formula 1® 2022 New Era car.

Enter the new era of Formula 1® in EA SPORTS™ F1® 22 the official video game of the 2022 FIA Formula One World Championship™
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Enter the new era of Formula 1® in EA SPORTS™ F1® 22 the official video game of the 2022 FIA Formula One World Championship™
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (Version 1909) | For Ray Tracing or VR: Windows 10 64-bit (Version 2004)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2130 or AMD FX 4300 |For VR: Intel Core i5-9600k or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or AMD RX 470 | For Ray Tracing: GeForce RTX 2060 or Radeon RX 6700 XT | For VR: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti or AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (Version 1909) | For Ray Tracing or VR: Windows 10 64-bit (Version 2004)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti or AMD RX 590 | For Ray Tracing: GeForce RTX 3070 or Radeon RX 6800 | For VR: NVIDIA RTX 2070 or AMD RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

data.legal_notice: REQUIRES F1® 22 (SOLD SEPARATELY) & ALL GAME UPDATES.
data.drm_notice: EA on-line activation and Origin client software installation and background use required.
